name: MIRAGE
description: Be immersed in a transcendental experience that brings your music to life. Use your own music and watch the environment react. Play music in any music player and MIRAGE will listen and respond. This is a world-class music visualizer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel i3-6100, AMD FX 4350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 960, AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 50 MB available space
